name: Bugs Life
description:
I did not finish everything i wanted, this game is based on papers please but from wish :) 

Characters are randomly generated with ( hats, eyes, antennaes)

There is a offer system, and a shopping system, all can be added without code with scriptable objects. 

I will put the code on git and models on sketchfab 

My Sketchfab Profile - it has a lot of free models for games
